summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ORVITI Academy Digital Certificate Management Platform. All requested features are working correctly including login, registration, dashboard, navigation, theme toggle, language switcher, and logout functionality. Session persistence issue from previous iterations has been FIXED.

issues: Demo credentials shown as admin@orviti.com but test@orviti.com also works

passed_tests: Login page renders correctly with glassmorphism style
User login with test@orviti.com / test123 - WORKING
User login with admin@orviti.com / admin123 - WORKING
User registration works and redirects to dashboard
Dashboard displays stats cards correctly (6 stat cards)
Navigation sidebar icons work and highlight active page
Courses page displays empty state correctly
Templates page displays empty state correctly
Recipients page displays empty state with filter
Generate diplomas page multi-step wizard navigation (4 steps: Courses, Templates, Recipients, Complete)
Logout functionality works and redirects to login
Mobile responsive view with sliding drawer sidebar
All data-testid attributes are properly set for testing
critical_code_review_comments: React useEffect dependency warnings in console but do not affect functionality
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Newly registered user test_user_1779@orviti.com was created during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features are working correctly. Session persistence issue from iterations 1-2 has been resolved. Theme toggle (dark/light mode) works via data-testid='theme-toggle'. Language switcher works via data-testid='language-toggle'. All sidebar navigation items have data-testid attributes in format nav-{routename}. Mobile view has hamburger menu with data-testid='mobile-menu-btn'.
